# NSSwapHostFloatToLittle(_:)

**Function**

Swaps the bytes of a number.

## Declaration

```swift
func NSSwapHostFloatToLittle(_ x: Float) -> NSSwappedFloat
```

## Discussion

Converts the value in `x`, specified in the current endian format, to little-endian format and returns the resulting value. If it is necessary to swap the bytes, this function calls [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSSwapFloat(_:)] to perform the swap.

## Related Documentation

- **NSSwapHostFloatToBig(_:)**: Swaps the bytes of a number.
- **NSSwapLittleFloatToHost(_:)**: Swaps the bytes of a number.
